name: New Year's Day
description: The first day of the year, celebrated nationwide except Johor, Kedah, Kelantan, Perlis, Terengganu.

name: Chinese New Year
description: Chinese New Year, celebrated for two days nationwide except Kelantan and Terengganu.

name: Hari Raya Aidilfitri
description: Muslim festival marking the end of Ramadan, celebrated nationwide (date may vary).

name: Malaysia Day
description: Commemorates the formation of Malaysia, celebrated nationwide.

name: Deepavali
description: Hindu festival of lights, celebrated nationwide except Sarawak.

name: Christmas Day
description: Christian holiday celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ, celebrated nationwide.
